snippet: A 20-year-old native of Cuba and a 19-year-old from the Bronx clinched two guaranteed spots on the United States Olympic gymnastics team headed to the London Games.
abstract: Danell Leyva wins the Olympic gymnastic trials and clinches one of two guaranteed spots on the United States team for the London Games; John Orozco grabs the other spot.
lead_paragraph: A 20-year-old native of Cuba and a 19-year-old from the Bronx clinched two guaranteed spots on the United States Olympic gymnastics team headed to the London Games.

headline.seo: American Gymnasts Head to Olympics by Way of Cuba and the Bronx
headline.main: Heading to London by Way of Cuba and the Bronx
headline.print_headline: Two Gymnasts Are Going to London For U.S. by Way of Cuba and Bronx
